effect_entries.effect:
User recovers the last item consumed by the user or a Pokémon in its position on the field.  The item must be used again before it can be recovered by this move again.  If the user is holding an item, this move fails.

Items taken or given away by covet, knock off, switcheroo, thief, or trick may not be recovered.
effect_entries.short_effect: User recovers the item it last used up.

flavor_text_entries.flavor_text:
Recycles a used item for
one more use.

Recycles a used item for
one more use.

A move that
recycles a used
item for use once
more.

The user recycles a
single-use item that
has been used in
battle so it can be
used again.

The user recycles a
single-use item that
has been used in
battle so it can be
used again.

The user recycles a
held item that
has been used in
battle so it can be
used again.

Recycle un objet tenu à usage unique
déjà utilisé lors du combat pour pouvoir
l’utiliser à nouveau.

The user recycles a held item that
has been used in battle so it can be
used again.

The user recycles a held item that
has been used in battle so it can be
used again.

せんとうちゅうに　つかって　なくなった
じぶんの　もちものを　さいせい　させて
つかえるように　する。

배틀 중에 사용하여 없어진
자신의 지닌 물건을 재생시켜
사용할 수 있게 한다.

Recycle un objet tenu à usage unique déjà utilisé
lors du combat pour pouvoir l’utiliser à nouveau.

Recycling eines getragenen Items,
das zuvor im Kampf verwendet wurde.

Recicla y así recupera un objeto equipado de un
solo uso que ya haya sido empleado durante el
combate.

Chi la usa ricicla uno strumento già usato
nella lotta e lo può riutilizzare.

The user recycles a held item that
has been used in battle so it can be
used again.

戦闘中に　使って　なくなった
自分の　持ち物を　再生させて
使えるように　する。
